Class PacketOutputStream

    • java.io.OutputStream

extends OutputStream

      • PacketOutputStream

        public PacketOutputStream(OutputStream outputStream,
                          boolean logQuery,
                          int maxQuerySizeToLog)
        Initialization with server outputStream.
        Parameters:
        outputStream - server outputStream
        logQuery - is query logging enable ?
        maxQuerySizeToLog - max query size to log

    • Method Detail

      • increase

        protected void increase(int newCapacity)

      • startPacket

        public void startPacket(int seqNo,
                        boolean checkPacketLength)
                 throws IOException
        Initialize stream sequence. Max stream allowed size will be checked.
        Parameters:
        seqNo - stream sequence number
        checkPacketLength - indication that max stream allowed size will be checked.
        Throws:
        IOException - if any error occur during data send to server

      • startPacket

                 throws IOException

        Parameters:
        seqNo - stream sequence number
        Throws:
        IOException - if any error occur during data send to server

        public void setCompressSeqNo(int compressSeqNo)

      • sendFile

        public void sendFile(InputStream is,
                     int seq)
              throws IOException
        Used to send LOAD DATA INFILE. End of data is indicated by stream of length 0.
        Parameters:
        is - inputStream to send
        seq - stream sequence number
        Throws:
        IOException - if any error occur during data send to server

      • releaseBuffer

        public void releaseBuffer()
        Reinitialized buffer to smaller size if needed to avoid memory consumption.

      • releaseBufferIfNotLogging

        public void releaseBufferIfNotLogging()
        If logging is not active, release buffer. (if logging is active, it will use the buffer to know send query and release buffer after a while)

      • finishPacketWithoutRelease

        public void finishPacketWithoutRelease(boolean logQuery)
                                throws IOException
        Ending command that tell to send buffer to server.
        Parameters:
        logQuery - log query (password mustn't be logged)
        Throws:
        IOException - if any connection error occur

      • forceCleanupBuffer

        public void forceCleanupBuffer()
        Force buffer cleanup.

        public void writeUnsafe(int value)

        Parameters:

      • checkRewritableLength

        public boolean checkRewritableLength(int length)
        Check that current buffer + length will not be superior to max_allowed_packet + header size. That permit to separate rewritable queries to be separate in multiple stream.
        Parameters:
        length - additionnal length
        Returns:
        true if with this additional length stream can be send in the same stream

      • compressedAndSend

        public void compressedAndSend(int notCompressPosition,
                              byte[] bufferBytes,
                              boolean logQuery)
                       throws IOException
        Compress datas and send them to database.
        Parameters:
        notCompressPosition - notCompressPosition
        bufferBytes - not compressed data buffer
        logQuery - log query
        Throws:
        IOException - if any compression or connection error occur

      • send

        public void send(byte[] packetBuffer,
                 int packetSize)
          throws IOException
        Send bytes according to compression.
        Parameters:
        packetBuffer - data to write
        packetSize - packet size
        Throws:
        IOException - if connection to server fail

      • send

        public void send(String sql,
                 byte commandType)
          throws IOException,
                 QueryException
        Send SQL string to outputStream. SQL will be transform to UTF-8 byte buffer, and if possible this buffer will be send to stream directly.
        Parameters:
        sql - sql
        commandType - command type
        Throws:
        IOException - if connection error occur.
        QueryException - if query size is to big according to server max_allowed_size

      • send

        public void send(String sql,
                 byte commandType,
                 Charset charset)
          throws IOException,
                 QueryException
        Send SQL string to outputStream. SQL will be transform to UTF-8 byte buffer, and if possible this buffer will be send to stream directly.
        Parameters:
        sql - sql
        commandType - command type
        charset - charset
        Throws:
        IOException - if connection error occur.
        QueryException - if query size is to big according to server max_allowed_size

      • sendDirect

        public void sendDirect(byte[] sqlBytes,
                       int offset,
                       int sqlLength,
                       byte commandType)
                throws IOException,
                       QueryException
        Send buffer to outputStream.
        Parameters:
        sqlBytes - buffer
        offset - offset
        sqlLength - length to send to stream
        commandType - command type
        Throws:
        IOException - if connection error occur
        QueryException - if query size is to big according to server max_allowed_size
